library(knitr)

  Abbreviation = c("MR",
                   "SNP"

  Term = c("Mendelian randomization",
           "Single nucleotide polymorphism"
           )) %>%
  
  arrange(Term) # i.e. alphabetical order by Term

  row.names = F, col.names = c("", ""))
